Text: If you just would start to seed ;)

See at the top of the window where it says search? Type in 'Lego Star Wars'.

Now below that, do you see where there is a pulldown window that says all? Select 'Wii".

Now click the 'pirate search' button.  

Wala, there are like 6-7 other torrents of this same game, most of which are being seeded, some of which are scrubbed and half the size to download. Amazing, huh?
